pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 23, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m.     The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2 p.m.      The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

La Malbaie, Quebec

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a community barbecue as well as a meet and greet ahead of the G7.

Complexe Sportif
104 rue Laure-Gaudreault

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6 p.m.
